name: Frostburn Snowball
description: An ever-changing Snowball that gained sentience, somehow. After adapting to the harsh conditions of the Nether, you feel stronger than ever... and yet, there's now a strange dragon-like roar in your mind.

upgrades.announcement: As you land the final blow on what seemed to be an unstoppable beast, you feel a Higher Power briefly stare at you... And then grant you strength. (Check your origin!)
